name: Autumnal Brown Vintage Colclough Tea Plate Wall Clock
description:
An autumnal brown and black patterned vintage china tea plate with a gold edge has become a wonderful wall clock.

The china was made by Colclough china and I have fitted the old retro plate with black filigree clock hands to create a unique wall clock. This china clock would make a lovely gift for a new home or a vintage enthusiast.  

The wall clock movement is a silent (yes a silent clock) and has a hook for easy hanging.

Measures 16.5 cms in diameter takes AA batteries. 1 battery included. It will be packed in thick foam in a secure cardboard box.

Each of my clocks is a unique design, the vintage plate has been hand sourced and adapted to create a beautiful wall decoration for your home.

Follow me on twitter: @Laviniateaparty

name: Navy Blue and Brown Square Vintage China Plate Wall Clock
description:
A regal navy blue, brown and orange design on English vintage china plate. This gorgeous clock would make a fantastic gift for a vintage lover or girly bedroom. The vintage china plate has been fitted with gold clock hands. 

The clock movement is a silent (no tick tocking) and has a hook for easy hanging.

Measures 15 cms in diameter takes AA batteries. 1 battery included.

Each of our clocks is a unique design, the vintage plate has been hand sourced and adapted to create a beautiful wall decoration for your home.

This listing is for one clock which is shown in the first three pictures.

name: Alfred Meakin Bengal Tree Vintage China Plate Wall Clock
description:
A gorgeous example of Alfred Meakin's hand painted 'Bengal Tree' design. We've turned the vintage plate into a beautiful clock with black clock hands. Perfect gift for a vintage tea party lover!

The clock movement is a silent (no tick tocking) and has a hook for easy hanging.

Measures 15 cms in diameter takes AA batteries. 1 battery included.

name: Hand painted Tulips Vintage China Plate Wall Clock
description:
This pretty china plate has been hand painted with pink, purple and yellow tulips by Victorian the Czechoslovakian china company. The vintage bone china plate has been fitted with matching yellow, green and purple clock hands. This gorgeous clock would make a fantastic gift. 

The clock movement is a silent (no tick tocking) and has a hook for easy hanging. 

Measures 15 cms in diameter takes AA batteries. 1 battery included. 

Each of our clocks is a unique design, the vintage plate has been hand sourced and adapted to create a beautiful wall decoration for your home.

name: Honeysuckle Colclough English china
description:
Made in England this vintage china clock is decorated in honeysuckle and summer flowers. Designed by Colclough English china and fitted with gold lattice clock hands.

The clock movement is a silent (no tick tocking) and has a hook for easy hanging.

Measures 15.5 cms in diameter takes AA batteries. 1 battery included.

Each of our clocks is a unique design, the vintage plate has been hand sourced and adapted to create a beautiful wall decoration for your home.
